summary.span: 提供在单个子元素（如 或 ）上或周围应用效果的元素的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for elements that apply effects onto or around a single child element, such as or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 由属性指定的单个 。A contains a single , which is specified by the property. 影响或修饰的 。The affects, or decorates, the . 可能有也可能没有外观。The may or may not have an appearance. 例如，会在 控件周围放置一个矩形，但不会 显示视觉对象。For example, a puts a rectangle around a control, but a has no visual presence. ## Examples 下面的示例将添加 的 属性 。The following example adds a the property of a . **注意** 该示例 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 版本可以使用 `` 围绕的内容的标记 ，但这并不是必需的，因为将 应用 到 属性。**Note** The Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of the , but it is not necessary because the applies the to the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XAML 概述 (WPF) ](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf). [!code-xaml[Border_snip#SimpleBorderWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_snip/CS/simpleborder.xaml#simpleborderwholepage)] [!code-csharp[Border_Procedural_snip#BasicBorderCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_Procedural_snip/CSharp/BasicBorderExample.cs#basicbordercodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[Border_Procedural_snip#BasicBorderCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Border_Procedural_snip/visualbasic/basicborderexample.vb#basicbordercodeexamplewholepage)] 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![具有黑色边框的 TextBox](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "具有黑色边框的 TextBox")![TextBox with black border](~/add/media/layout-border-around-textbox.png "TextBox with black border") 文本框周围的边框Border around a TextBox

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为在其子 集合中只能有一个子对象，所以此属性始终报告0或1。Because a can have only one child object in its child collection, this property always reports 0 or 1.
